thread.title: constantine mouzakis
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by constantine mouzakis

author: constantine mouzakis
title: constantine mouzakis
text:
Everything I have ordered so far (last 12 months) delivered with no problems and in excellent condition. Customer service is very helpful.
The major items I have ordered: Pentax K3II, Pentax K1 (full frame) and lenses. I would like to recommend B&H, they are really good.
